name: copperlark&primecoin reaper
short_description:
New Reaper client for Copperlark and primecoin solo mining. 
7970 - 160 Mh
7950 - 125 Mh
7870 - 81 Mh
7850 - 75 Mh
How to mine Primecoin solo with this client - 
Make Primecoin.conf in \AppData\Roaming\Primecoin
server=1
rpcuser=XXX
rpcpassword=XXX
rpcallowip=*
rpcport=6332
Run Primecoin-qt as server.
Open copperlark.conf

host localhost
port 6332
user ***
pass ***

protocol copperlark

worksize 256
aggression 20
sharethreads 1
cpu_mining_threads 0
check_shares true
threads_per_gpu 1
getwork_rate 2000

Get start!

Also u can mine copperlark in solo.

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: End Users/Desktop

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: 64-bit MS Windows
